Peluang Penajaan Pengajian di Hari Terbuka Biasiswa
===================================================

by [website](https://fke.utm.my/author/website/ "Posts by website")
 | Mar 13, 2018 | [Anouncement](https://fke.utm.my/category/anouncement/)
, [Faculty](https://fke.utm.my/category/faculty/)

![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/admission-small.png)

![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/admission.jpg)

Untuk maklumat​ lanjut, saudara/i boleh ​me​layari ​laman web berikut.

Makluman biasiswa : ​[https://biasiswa.mohe.gov.my/MyBrain15/v2/index.php](https://biasiswa.mohe.gov.my/MyBrain15/v2/index.php)
​

Permohonan surat tawaran : [http://spsapp3.utm.my:8080/intakev4/index.jsp](http://spsapp3.utm.my:8080/intakev4/index.jsp)
​

​Tarikh permohonan tajaan MyBrain15 adalah daripada 1 Mac 2018 – 31 Mac 2018.​

Sebarang pertanyaan boleh majukan ke [graduate@utm.my](mailto:graduate@utm.my)
